com.foreach.across.modules.dynamicforms.domain.document.data

Class DynamicDocumentDataLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.dynamicforms.domain.document.data.DynamicDocumentDataLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicDocumentDataFieldWriter, Reporter

    public class DynamicDocumentDataLoader
extends Object
implements DynamicDocumentDataFieldWriter, Reporter
    Helper object for bulk loading of data in a document. Supports optional type conversion as well as ignoring unknown fields or fields with illegal value according to the field type.

    Can actually perform full tracking of all field values updated if enabled, this can be used to determine if a document has actually been updated.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    DynamicDocumentDataMapper

      • load

        public void load(@NonNull
                 Map<String,Object> data)
        Load the data in the document. Depending on the values of ignoreUnknownFields and ignoreIllegalFieldValues an exception will be thrown immediately if something goes wrong.

        If errors should be ignored, the DynamicDocumentDataLoader.Report will still contain a list of DynamicDocumentDataLoader.FieldError records for all fields that could not be imported.

        This is identical to calling setFieldValues(Map).

        Parameters:
        data - to import

      • setIgnoreUnknownFields

        public void setIgnoreUnknownFields(boolean ignoreUnknownFields)
        Should unknown fields be ignore. If false an exception will be thrown when an unknown field is specified.

      • setIgnoreIllegalFieldValues

        public void setIgnoreIllegalFieldValues(boolean ignoreIllegalFieldValues)
        Should invalid field values be ignored. If false an exception will be thrown when attempting to set a field value of the wrong type.

      • getReport

        public DynamicDocumentDataLoader.Report getReport()
        Return the report information for the current document.
